name: Guild Defense
description:
Create your own guild! Delve into procedural dungeons and fight unseen beasts! Use your own abilities or towers to aide you in combat and survival! Bring your guild to the top in this action RPG tower defense hybrid game!

This is a prototype of a game that MAY be made in the future. The fate of this project is uncertain and was originally started as a Dungeon Defenders fan game.

Features!
The Class System allows you to impact who your character can be! Pick a main class then you can dive into the sub classes offering up more opportunities! Once you've fated your characters you can specialize them!

The Tower Defense Aspect plays a HUGE role in Guild Defense! You need to not only explore dungeons but claim them as your own!
